# Example 2.5.1

```{r}
N = 1e4 #number of generated values
stop = 25

mean <- rep(0, times = stop)
var <- rep(0, times = stop)

for(n in 1:stop){
  M <- matrix(data=runif(N*n), nrow=n, ncol=N)
  approx <- sqrt(12/n) * (apply(M, MARGIN=2, FUN=sum) - n/2)
  mean[n] <- mean(approx)
  var[n] <- var(approx)
}

n <- c(1:stop)
plot(n, mean)
plot(n, var)
#hist(approx, prob=TRUE)
#qqnorm(approx)
```
